channel.title: Lag related to Error Bone Access
channel.description:
Since playing the game with the console enabled I have noticed that whenever I get the error bone access come up my game starts to lag...
Is their anyway to fix the Error bone access entities as I feel this is causing problems to performance... But I could be wrong or it could be something related to this.
Either way I would like to know if this error is fixible as it seems to reference numbered entities and repaets the error of an npc until it's dead.
Alien grunts seem to carry this problem
